false_negatives.description: Fix SSH connection management and authentication

model_response.summary: The codebase is a well-structured documentation system for Ansible, built using Sphinx. The architecture follows established patterns with clear separation between configuration, testing, and utility scripts. No critical security vulnerabilities were identified, including no instances of SQL injection, XSS, or exposed secrets. Code quality is high with proper error handling, maintainable structure, and performance optimizations. The system adheres to Python best practices and industry standards. All review tasks have been completed and verified.
